title: Ecobee makes its new Smart Thermostat Premium and Enhanced official, starting at $200
content:
In just the last few days, new Premium and Enhanced thermostats from Ecobee were leaked pretty much in full. Now, they’re officially official, and we know a little more about the new smart home devices. Ecobee hasn’t launched a new thermostat in around three years, so fans have every right to be excited. The two-fold

The post Ecobee makes its new Smart Thermostat Premium and Enhanced official, starting at $200 appeared first on XDA.
description: The leaks were true and Ecobee has pulled the wraps off a pair of new smart thermostat products, with features including a new air quality monitor.
